entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
